name: Egg Teacher VR
description:
Ever wonder if you’d make a good egg teacher? How about an egg lecturer?
Well, wonder no more, for in Egg Teacher VR you can do just that!
Though, actually, you’ll do anything but teach the eggs – prepare to deal with a color-locked computer,
noisy students and invasions of paper planes, houseflies or computer mice – and that’s just the tip of the iceberg!
Test your reflexes in varied challenges requiring speed and precision; race against the timer earning
points for speed and accuracy, and perhaps you’ll make your way to the top of the scoreboard!
